name: Twin Dragons
description:
Twin Dragons alpha release v1.0

Controls:
A - Jump
B - Attack
D-Pad - Move
Start - Pause

This game was written in the Millfork (https://karols.github.io/millfork/) programming language.
Source code is released under a zlib license.
Some art/sfx are released under a creative commons license, see README.md in the source code folder for details.
